title: Branch change
content: I have finished my first year and want to change my branch, I was told that there will be an application form released in pesu academy. The college will start in 10 days and I haven't received any notification. Did anyone receive any mail? Will there be a branch changing possibilities this year?

comments.body: The application form will be released a few weeks after second year starts
Same here I have been waiting
Hey if you donâ€™t mind , what branch are planning to go to and what u think the cgpa needed would be
